name: Artificer
description: A master of invention who uses ingenuity and magic to unlock extraordinary capabilities in objects.

features.name: Magical Tinkering
features.description: You learn how to invest a spark of magic into mundane objects.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You've studied the workings of magic and how to cast spells, channeling the magic through objects.

features.name: Infuse Item
features.description: You've gained the ability to imbue mundane items with certain magical infusions.

features.name: The Right Tool for the Job
features.description: You've learned how to produce exactly the tool you need: with thieves' tools or artisan's tools in hand, you can magically create one set of artisan's tools in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you.

features.name: Artificer Specialist
features.description: Choose the type of specialist you are.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two by 1.

features.name: Tool Expertise
features.description: Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses your proficiency with a tool.

features.name: Flash of Genius
features.description: When you or another creature you can see within 30 feet makes an ability check or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to add your Intelligence modifier to the roll.

features.name: Magic Item Adept
features.description: You've achieved a profound understanding of how to use and make magic items.

features.name: Spell-Storing Item
features.description: You can now store a spell in an object.

features.name: Magic Item Savant
features.description: Your skill with magic items deepens.

features.name: Magic Item Master
features.description: You can now attune to up to six magic items at once.

features.name: Soul of Artifice
features.description: You have developed a mystical connection to your magic items. You gain a +1 bonus to all saving throws per magic item you are currently attuned to.

spells.name: Acid Splash
spells.description: Hurl a bubble of acid at one or two creatures within 5 feet of each other, dealing acid damage on a failed Dexterity save.

spells.name: Create Bonfire
spells.description: Create a magical bonfire in a 5-foot cube that deals fire damage to creatures that start their turn in or enter the area.

spells.name: Dancing Lights
spells.description: Create up to four floating, torch-sized lights that you can move up to 60 feet as a bonus action. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.description: Hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object, dealing fire damage on a hit. Flammable unattended objects are ignited.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: Deal cold damage to a creature on a failed Constitution save, and it has disadvantage on its next weapon attack roll.

spells.name: Guidance
spells.description: Touch a willing creature to grant it an extra d4 on one ability check of its choice. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Light
spells.description: Touch an object to make it shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet for 1 hour.

spells.name: Mage Hand
spells.description: Create a spectral floating hand that can manipulate objects, open doors, or carry up to 10 pounds within 30 feet.

spells.name: Magic Stone
spells.description: Enchant up to three pebbles to deal bludgeoning damage using your spellcasting modifier when thrown or hurled with a sling.

spells.name: Mending
spells.description: Repair a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link or a torn cloak.

spells.name: Message
spells.description: Whisper a message to a creature within 120 feet, which only the target hears. It can reply in a whisper only you hear.

spells.name: Poison Spray
spells.description: Project a puff of noxious gas at a creature within 10 feet, dealing poison damage on a failed Constitution save.

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.description: Perform minor magical tricks such as creating sensory effects, lighting or snuffing small flames, cleaning or soiling objects, and other harmless effects.

spells.name: Ray of Frost
spells.description: Fire a frigid beam at a creature, dealing cold damage on a hit and reducing its speed by 10 feet until your next turn.

spells.name: Resistance
spells.description: Touch a willing creature to grant it an extra d4 on one saving throw of its choice. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Shocking Grasp
spells.description: Deliver a jolt of lightning with your touch, dealing lightning damage with advantage if the target wears metal armor. The target can't take reactions until its next turn.

spells.name: Spare the Dying
spells.description: Touch a living creature at 0 hit points to stabilize it. This has no effect on undead or constructs.

spells.name: Thorn Whip
spells.description: Create a vine-like whip that deals piercing damage on a hit and pulls a Large or smaller creature up to 10 feet closer to you.

spells.name: Thunderclap
spells.description: Create a burst of thunderous sound audible 100 feet away, dealing thunder damage to all creatures within 5 feet on a failed Constitution save.

spells.name: Absorb Elements
spells.description: Use your reaction to gain resistance to the triggering acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, and deal an extra 1d6 of that type on your next melee attack.

spells.name: Alarm
spells.description: Set a ward on a 20-foot cube that alerts you (mentally or audibly) when a creature enters the area for 8 hours. Can be cast as a ritual.

spells.name: Catapult
spells.description: Hurl an object weighing up to 5 pounds in a straight line up to 90 feet, dealing bludgeoning damage on a failed Dexterity save.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description: Touch a creature to restore hit points equal to 1d8 plus your spellcasting modifier. Has no effect on undead or constructs.

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.description: Sense the presence of magic within 30 feet for up to 10 minutes. You can use your action to see a faint aura and learn its school. Can be cast as a ritual.

spells.name: Disguise Self
spells.description: Make yourself look different for 1 hour, changing your appearance including height, weight, clothing, and equipment. Physical inspection reveals the illusion.

spells.name: Expeditious Retreat
spells.description: Take the Dash action as a bonus action on the turn you cast this, and on each subsequent turn for up to 10 minutes. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Faerie Fire
spells.description: Outline creatures in a 20-foot cube with light on a failed Dexterity save, granting advantage on attack rolls against them and negating invisibility. Requires concentration.

spells.name: False Life
spells.description: Gain 1d4 + 4 temporary hit points for 1 hour. Temporary hit points increase by 5 for each slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Feather Fall
spells.description: Use your reaction to slow the falling rate of up to five creatures within 60 feet, preventing fall damage for 1 minute.

spells.name: Grease
spells.description: Cover a 10-foot square in slippery grease, forcing creatures to make a Dexterity save or fall prone. The area is difficult terrain.

spells.name: Healing Word
spells.description: A creature of your choice within 60 feet regains hit points equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting modifier. Has no effect on undead or constructs.

spells.name: Heroism
spells.description: A willing creature you touch gains temporary hit points equal to your spellcasting modifier at the start of each of its turns and is immune to being frightened for up to 1 minute. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Identify
spells.description: Touch an object or creature to learn its magical properties, how to use them, and any spells affecting it. Can be cast as a ritual.

spells.name: Jump
spells.description: Touch a creature to triple its jump distance for 1 minute.

spells.name: Longstrider
spells.description: Touch a creature to increase its speed by 10 feet for 1 hour. Does not require concentration.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: Create three glowing darts of magical force that each deal 1d4+1 force damage to targets of your choice within 120 feet. The darts hit automatically.

spells.name: Purify Food and Drink
spells.description: Render all nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot-radius sphere free of poison and disease. Can be cast as a ritual.

spells.name: Ray of Sickness
spells.description: A ray of sickening greenish energy deals 2d8 poison damage on a hit. The target must also make a Constitution save or be poisoned until the end of your next turn.

spells.name: Sanctuary
spells.description: Ward a creature so that enemies must make a Wisdom save to target it with attacks or harmful spells for 1 minute. Ends if the warded creature attacks or casts a harmful spell.

spells.name: Shield
spells.description: Use your reaction when hit by an attack or targeted by magic missile to gain +5 AC until the start of your next turn, including against the triggering attack, and take no damage from magic missile.

spells.name: Snare
spells.description: Create a magical trap in a 5-foot radius that hoists a creature 3 feet in the air upside down on a failed Dexterity save until dispelled or the rope is cut.

spells.name: Tasha's Caustic Brew
spells.description: Emit a stream of acid in a 30-foot line that deals 2d4 acid damage at the start of each affected creature's turn on a failed Dexterity save. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Thunderwave
spells.description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you in a 15-foot cube, dealing 2d8 thunder damage on a failed Constitution save and pushing creatures 10 feet away. Audible 300 feet away.

spells.name: Aid
spells.description: Bolster up to three creatures with toughness, increasing their hit point maximum and current hit points by 5 for 8 hours.

spells.name: Alter Self
spells.description: Transform your body for up to 1 hour, gaining aquatic adaptation, a new appearance, or natural weapons that deal 1d6+1 force damage. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Arcane Lock
spells.description: Magically lock a closed door, window, gate, or chest, increasing the DC to break or pick it by 10. You can designate creatures that can open it normally.

spells.name: Blur
spells.description: Your body becomes blurred, granting attackers disadvantage on attack rolls against you for up to 1 minute. Requires concentration. Ineffective against creatures with blindsight or truesight.

spells.name: Branding Smite
spells.description: The next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack, it deals an extra 2d6 radiant damage and the target becomes visible if invisible, shedding dim light in a 5-foot radius. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Continual Flame
spells.description: Create a permanent flame on an object that emits light equivalent to a torch. The flame can be covered but not extinguished, and it produces no heat.

spells.name: Darkvision
spells.description: Grant a willing creature you touch darkvision out to 60 feet for 8 hours.

spells.name: Enhance Ability
spells.description: Grant a creature advantage on ability checks for one chosen ability score for up to 1 hour, plus a bonus effect depending on the ability chosen. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Enlarge/Reduce
spells.description: Cause a creature or object to grow or shrink for up to 1 minute. Enlarged creatures deal an extra 1d4 damage and have advantage on Strength checks; reduced creatures deal 1d4 less damage and have disadvantage. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Flaming Sphere
spells.description: Conjure a 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire that deals 2d6 fire damage to creatures ending their turn within 5 feet on a failed Dexterity save. You can move it 30 feet as a bonus action. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Heat Metal
spells.description: Cause a metal object to glow red-hot, dealing 2d8 fire damage to a creature in contact with it. The creature must make a Constitution save or drop the object. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.description: Make a creature you touch invisible for up to 1 hour. The spell ends if the target attacks or casts a spell. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Lesser Restoration
spells.description: Touch a creature to end one disease or one condition: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

spells.name: Levitate
spells.description: Cause a creature or object to rise vertically up to 20 feet and remain suspended for up to 10 minutes. An unwilling creature can make a Constitution save to resist. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Melf's Acid Arrow
spells.description: A shimmering green arrow deals 4d4 acid damage on a hit plus 2d4 acid damage at the end of the target's next turn. On a miss, deals half initial damage and no ongoing damage.

spells.name: Magic Mouth
spells.description: Implant a message on an object that is spoken when a specified trigger occurs. The message can be up to 25 words and the spell lasts until dispelled. Can be cast as a ritual.

spells.name: Magic Weapon
spells.description: Touch a nonmagical weapon to grant it a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls for up to 1 hour. The bonus increases at higher slot levels. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description: Create three illusory duplicates of yourself. When attacked, roll to see if the attack targets a duplicate instead. Duplicates have AC 10 + your Dexterity modifier and vanish when hit. Lasts 1 minute.

spells.name: Protection from Poison
spells.description: Touch a creature to neutralize one poison affecting it, grant advantage on saving throws against poison, and give resistance to poison damage for 1 hour.

spells.name: Pyrotechnics
spells.description: Target a nonmagical fire to either create a 10-foot-radius blinding fireworks display or a 20-foot-radius heavily obscuring smoke cloud. Extinguishes the fire.

spells.name: Rope Trick
spells.description: A rope rises into the air and leads to an extradimensional space that holds up to 8 creatures for 1 hour. The space is invisible and inaccessible from outside.

spells.name: Scorching Ray
spells.description: Create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within 120 feet. Each ray deals 2d6 fire damage on a hit. You can direct them at one or multiple targets.

spells.name: See Invisibility
spells.description: See invisible creatures and objects, and see into the Ethereal Plane for 1 hour. Does not require concentration.

spells.name: Shatter
spells.description: A loud ringing noise erupts in a 10-foot-radius sphere within 60 feet, dealing 3d8 thunder damage on a failed Constitution save, or half on a success. Creatures made of inorganic material have disadvantage on the save.

spells.name: Skywrite
spells.description: Write up to 10 words across the sky using clouds for up to 1 hour. The writing is visible from up to 1 mile away. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Spider Climb
spells.description: Grant a willing creature you touch the ability to walk on walls and ceilings and a climbing speed equal to its walking speed for up to 1 hour. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Web
spells.description: Fill a 20-foot cube with thick, sticky webs that restrain creatures who fail a Dexterity save. The webs are difficult terrain and lightly obscure the area. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Warding Bond
spells.description: Touch a willing creature and create a bond. The target gains +1 AC, +1 to saving throws, and resistance to all damage, but you take the same amount of damage it takes. Lasts 1 hour. Requires a pair of platinum rings worth 50 gp.

spells.name: Aura of Vitality
spells.description: Healing energy radiates from you in a 30-foot aura. As a bonus action each turn, you can cause one creature in the aura to regain 2d6 hit points. Requires concentration, lasts 1 minute.

spells.name: Blink
spells.description: At the end of each of your turns, roll a d20. On 11 or higher, you vanish to the Ethereal Plane until the start of your next turn for up to 1 minute.

spells.name: Catnap
spells.description: Put up to three willing creatures into a 10-minute magical slumber that grants the benefits of a short rest. The spell ends early if a target takes damage.

spells.name: Conjure Barrage
spells.description: Throw a nonmagical weapon or fire a piece of nonmagical ammunition to create a cone of duplicates in a 60-foot cone, dealing 3d8 damage on a failed Dexterity save, or half on a success.

spells.name: Create Food and Water
spells.description: Create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water, enough to sustain up to fifteen humanoids or five steeds for 24 hours.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: End one spell of 3rd level or lower on a target. For higher-level spells, make a spellcasting ability check against DC 10 + the spell's level.

spells.name: Elemental Weapon
spells.description: Enchant a nonmagical weapon with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and an extra 1d4 elemental damage of a chosen type for up to 1 hour. Bonuses increase at higher slot levels. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: A bright streak detonates in a 20-foot-radius sphere at a point within 150 feet, dealing 8d6 fire damage on a failed Dexterity save, or half on a success. Ignites flammable objects.

spells.name: Flame Arrows
spells.description: Enchant a quiver of ammunition so that up to 12 pieces deal an extra 1d6 fire damage on a hit for up to 1 hour. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Fly
spells.description: Grant a willing creature you touch a flying speed of 60 feet for up to 10 minutes. The creature falls if the spell ends while airborne. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Gaseous Form
spells.description: Transform a willing creature you touch into a misty cloud with a fly speed of 10 feet. The target has resistance to nonmagical damage, advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saves, and can pass through small openings. Requires concentration, lasts 1 hour.

spells.name: Glyph of Warding
spells.description: Inscribe a glyph on a surface or object that triggers a damaging explosion or stores a spell when a creature enters the area or opens the object.

spells.name: Haste
spells.description: Double a creature's speed, grant +2 AC, advantage on Dexterity saves, and an extra action each turn for up to 1 minute. When the spell ends, the target can't move or act until its next turn. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Hypnotic Pattern
spells.description: Create a twisting pattern of colors in a 30-foot cube within 120 feet. Creatures that see it must make a Wisdom save or become charmed, incapacitated, and have speed 0 for up to 1 minute. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Intellect Fortress
spells.description: Grant a willing creature you can see resistance to psychic damage and advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws for up to 1 hour. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.description: A bolt of lightning forms a 100-foot line that is 5 feet wide, dealing 8d6 lightning damage on a failed Dexterity save, or half on a success. Ignites flammable objects.

spells.name: Mass Healing Word
spells.description: Up to six creatures of your choice within 60 feet each regain hit points equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting modifier. Has no effect on undead or constructs.

spells.name: Protection from Energy
spells.description: Grant a willing creature you touch resistance to one damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder) for up to 1 hour. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Revivify
spells.description: Touch a creature that has died within the last minute to return it to life with 1 hit point. Requires 300 gp worth of diamonds, which the spell consumes.

spells.name: Tiny Servant
spells.description: Animate a Tiny nonmagical object, giving it legs and arms. It obeys your commands, can carry up to 10 pounds, and lasts for 8 hours.

spells.name: Water Breathing
spells.description: Grant up to ten willing creatures the ability to breathe underwater for 24 hours. Can be cast as a ritual.

spells.name: Water Walk
spells.description: Grant up to ten willing creatures the ability to walk on liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground for 1 hour. Can be cast as a ritual.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: Create a wall of strong wind up to 50 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick within 120 feet. It deflects arrows and smaller projectiles, disperses gas, and Small or smaller flying creatures must make a Strength save or be pushed away. Requires concentration, lasts 1 minute.

spells.name: Aura of Purity
spells.description: Purifying energy radiates from you in a 30-foot aura. Creatures in the aura can't become diseased, have resistance to poison damage, and have advantage on saves against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, or stunned. Requires concentration, lasts 10 minutes.

spells.name: Arcane Eye
spells.description: Create an invisible, magical eye that you can move up to 30 feet per turn and see through within 30 feet of it for up to 1 hour. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Elemental Bane
spells.description: Choose a damage type and up to one creature within 90 feet. On a failed Constitution save, the target loses resistance to that damage type and takes an extra 2d6 damage of that type once per turn. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Fabricate
spells.description: Convert raw materials into finished products of the same material instantly. You must be proficient with the relevant artisan's tools if crafting something requiring skill.

spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.description: Thin flames wreathe your body for 10 minutes, shedding light and granting resistance to cold or fire damage (your choice). Creatures that hit you with melee attacks take 2d8 damage of the other type.

spells.name: Freedom of Movement
spells.description: Touch a willing creature to make its movement unaffected by difficult terrain, and it can't be paralyzed or restrained by spells or magical effects for 1 hour.

spells.name: Greater Invisibility
spells.description: A creature you touch becomes invisible for up to 1 minute. Unlike regular invisibility, the effect doesn't end when the target attacks or casts a spell. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.description: A hail of rock-hard ice pounds a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder within 300 feet, dealing 2d8 bludgeoning and 4d6 cold damage on a failed Dexterity save, or half on a success. The area becomes difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

spells.name: Leomund's Secret Chest
spells.description: Hide a chest and its contents on the Ethereal Plane, recallable with a tiny replica. The spell lasts until dispelled but has a cumulative 5% daily chance of being lost.

spells.name: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound
spells.description: Conjure a phantom watchdog in an unoccupied space that barks at hostile creatures within 30 feet and can bite for 4d8 force damage for 8 hours.

spells.name: Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum
spells.description: Create a magically secured area up to a 100-foot cube where sound, divination, planar travel, and teleportation are blocked for 24 hours.

spells.name: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
spells.description: Enclose a creature or object in a shimmering sphere of force that nothing can pass through for up to 1 minute. An unwilling creature can make a Dexterity save to avoid it. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Stone Shape
spells.description: Touch a stone object or section of stone no larger than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape you desire.

spells.name: Stoneskin
spells.description: Grant a willing creature you touch resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for up to 1 hour. Requires 100 gp of diamond dust. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Summon Construct
spells.description: Summon a construct spirit that takes the form of a clay, metal, or stone construct. It obeys your commands and lasts for up to 1 hour. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.description: Create a wall of fire up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter. One side deals 5d8 fire damage to creatures within 10 feet on a failed Dexterity save. Requires concentration, lasts 1 minute.

spells.name: Animate Objects
spells.description: Animate up to ten nonmagical objects that attack on your command, each with stats based on size. You can command them as a bonus action. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Banishing Smite
spells.description: The next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack, it deals an extra 5d10 force damage. If this reduces the target to 50 HP or fewer, it is banished to a demiplane until the spell ends. Requires concentration, lasts 1 minute.

spells.name: Bigby's Hand
spells.description: Create a Large spectral hand of force that can punch, push, grasp, or block. You direct it as a bonus action for up to 1 minute. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Cloudkill
spells.description: Create a 20-foot-radius sphere of poisonous yellowish-green fog centered on a point within 120 feet. Creatures in the fog take 5d8 poison damage on a failed Constitution save, or half on a success. The fog moves 10 feet away from you each turn. Requires concentration, lasts 10 minutes.

spells.name: Cone of Cold
spells.description: A blast of cold air erupts in a 60-foot cone, dealing 8d8 cold damage on a failed Constitution save, or half on a success. Creatures killed by this spell become frozen solid.

spells.name: Creation
spells.description: Create a nonliving object of vegetable or mineral matter within a 5-foot cube. Vegetable matter lasts 1 day; mineral matter duration varies by material.

spells.name: Greater Restoration
spells.description: Touch a creature to end one effect reducing its ability scores or hit point maximum, or remove one charm, petrification, curse, or effect reducing its levels. Consumes 100 gp of diamond dust.

spells.name: Mass Cure Wounds
spells.description: A wave of healing energy washes over up to six creatures of your choice within a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 60 feet. Each target regains 3d8 plus your spellcasting modifier hit points. Has no effect on undead or constructs.

spells.name: Passwall
spells.description: Create a passage through wood, plaster, or stone walls up to 5 feet wide, 8 feet tall, and 20 feet deep for 1 hour. The passage disappears when the spell ends, trapping creatures or objects still inside.

spells.name: Raise Dead
spells.description: Return a dead creature that has been dead no longer than 10 days to life with 1 hit point. The spell neutralizes poisons and cures nonmagical diseases but doesn't remove magical diseases, curses, or restore missing body parts. Consumes 500 gp of diamonds.

spells.name: Skill Empowerment
spells.description: Grant a willing creature you touch expertise (double proficiency bonus) in one skill it is already proficient in for up to 1 hour. Requires concentration.

spells.name: Transmute Rock
spells.description: Transmute a 40-foot cube of nonmagical rock into mud or mud into rock. Creatures in rock-to-mud sink and must make a Dexterity save or be restrained.

spells.name: Wall of Force
spells.description: Create an invisible wall of force up to ten 10-foot-by-10-foot panels within 120 feet. The wall is immune to all damage and can't be dispelled by dispel magic. Nothing can physically pass through it. Requires concentration, lasts 10 minutes.

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.description: Create a nonmagical wall of stone panels, each 10 feet by 10 feet by 6 inches thick, on a solid surface for up to 10 minutes. If it fully encloses an area, it becomes permanent. Requires concentration.

features: The Right Tool for the Job
